other_tests.findings: Dense, diffuse lymphocytic infiltrate in the papillary and reticular dermis, composed predominantly of large dysplastic lymphocytes marked as B cells (CD20, /H11001). Two cases had neoplastic cells that were BCL-2 positive.
Achieved a complete response after treatment in Case 1, but near complete response in Case 3.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Patient 1 relapsed after 12 months; Patient 2 developed new painful nodules shortly after treatment.

other_tests.findings: Patient 1 responded well with significant decrease in size of tumors and edema post-treatment.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Patient 1 had a complete clinical remission 28 months after diagnosis.

other_tests.findings: Patient 1 had a complete and durable second response.
